name: Rumfola v. Community Consumers Discount Company of Clearfield, Appellant

parties: Rumfola v. Community Consumers Discount Company of Clearfield, Appellant.

opinions.text:
Opinion
Per Curiam,
The judgment is affirmed on the opinion of President Judge Pentz reported at 3 D. & C. 2d 723.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: Robert V. Main, with him Frank G. Smith, Frank A. Whitsett, Joseph J. Lee, and Smith, Maine, Whit-sett & Lee, for appellant.

Rumfola v. Community Consumers Discount Company of Clearfield, Appellant.
Argued September 27, 1955.
Before Steen, C. J., Steaene, Jones and Musmanno, JJ.
